```{css, echo=FALSE}

.contact-box {
  position: relative;
  border: 2px solid lightgrey;
  padding: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
}


.contact-wrapper {
  display: flex;
}

.contact-text {
  flex-grow: 1;
}

.link {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: #007bff;
}

.link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.year {
  position: absolute;
  top: 10px;
  right: 10px;
  font-weight: bold;
  padding-left: 10px; /* Add left padding to separate the year from the text */
}


h2 {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  font-size: 1.3em;
  margin-right: 50px; /* Add right margin to separate the title from the year */
}

p {
  margin-bottom: 0;
}

```
